Term.Name: CRC16 (ITU-T)
Term.Definition: As specified by CCITT/ITU-T and used by X.25, V.41, Bluetooth, PPP, IrDA. Polynomial: x^16 + x^12 + x^5 + 1

Term.Name: CRC32 (MPEG-2)
Term.Definition: As specified in IEEE 802.3, ITU-T V.42 and MPEG-2. Polynomial: x^32 + x^26 + x^23 + x^22 + x^16 + x^12 + x^11 + x^10 + x^8 + x^7 + x^5 + x^4 + x^2 + x + 1

Term.Name: CRC64 (ISO)
Term.Definition: As specified in ISO 3309 for use by HDLC. Polynomial: x^64 + x^4 + x^3 + x + 1

Term.Name: MD5
Term.Definition: Message-Digest algorithm 5, a 128-bit hash designed at MIT by Professor Ronald Rivest.

Term.Name: SHA-1
Term.Definition: 160-bit Secure Hash Algorithm, developed by the United States National Security Agency and published by NIST.
